titles: Ariadne, or, The marriage of Bacchus an opera or a vocal representation / first compos'd by Monsieur P.P., now put into musick by Monsieur Grabut ... and acted by the Royall Academy of Musick at the Theatre-Royal in Covent-Garden.
author: Grabu, Louis, d. 1694.
Perrin, P. (Pierre), ca. 1620-1675. Ariane.
Cambert, Robert, ca. 1628-1677.
